settings.name: Sunkara Amrutha Varshini
settings.title: Full Stack Developer
settings.summary: Enthusiastic and aspiring Full‑Stack Developer with experience in the MERN stack, Python, and blockchain technologies. Eager to build innovative, secure, and scalable solutions.

about.title: About Me
about.content: I am a highly motivated and skilled web developer with a passion for creating innovative and user-friendly applications. My experience includes working with MERN stack, Python, and blockchain technologies. I am eager to contribute my skills and learn from experienced professionals in a challenging and dynamic environment. I am always seeking opportunities to expand my knowledge and contribute to meaningful projects.

items.description: Completed a 10-week virtual internship focused on MERN stack development and real-world web applications. Built projects integrating React, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB; deployed on cloud platforms.
Completed a short-term internship on Python with hands-on projects and coding tasks. Learned OOP, functions, file handling, and algorithmic thinking using Python.

items.title: Blockchain-Based Digital Receipt & Warranty System
items.description: Developed a decentralized platform to issue, track, and verify product warranties using blockchain. Integrated smart contracts with MetaMask for product validation. Built full MERN stack with role-based access control and warranty lifecycle tracking.

items.title: Movie Review Web App
items.description: Created a full-stack application for users to submit and view movie reviews. Handled user authentication and real-time review updates using RESTful APIs.

items.title: Gym Website for Elewaye
items.description: Designed a fully responsive landing page for a fitness brand with class schedules and contact forms. Improved user interaction through dynamic elements and mobile-friendly layout.

items.institution: Gayatri Vidya Parishad College of Engineering for Women
